description:
Framed for a deadly drunk driving accident by his former employer, the next prime minister, a man asks Ryo to help fake his suicide.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Gunshot to Set the Heart A Flutter! Sad, Lonely Girl
Kokoro Furueru Juusei: Kanashiki Lonely Girl
La petite fille sur la balançoire
心ふるえる銃声 悲しきロンリーガール
